message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would that work for you?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. However,  $150 is my asking price. Could you meet me halfway at $125?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up offer. While I appreciate the adjustment, I am still unable to meet at $125. I am willing to go up to $100 for this product. Would that be possible?
